attributes.action: Reopen the petition to end section 21 no fault evictions
attributes.additional_details: Families are being made homeless for no valid reason.

rejection.details:
We currently have a petition open asking that the Renters (Reform) Bill is fast tracked. This legislation would abolish assured shorthold tenancies and with them, section 21 ‘no fault’ evictions. 

You can sign this petition, 'Fast-track the Renters (Reform) Bill' here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641936
